<a id="class_Lightmapper"></a>

# Lightmapper

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [LightmapperRD](class_lightmapperrd.md)

Abstract class extended by lightmappers, for use in [LightmapGI](class_lightmapgi.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This class should be extended by custom lightmapper classes. Lightmappers can then be used with [LightmapGI](class_lightmapgi.md) to provide fast baked global illumination in 3D.

Redot contains a built-in GPU-based lightmapper [LightmapperRD](class_lightmapperrd.md) that uses compute shaders, but custom lightmappers can be implemented by C++ modules.
